lines.text: I was just looking for Keats. Do you like Keats?
I don't know, sir. What are keats?
Well, I don't see what he sees in her. She's old. She must be twenty-five at least.
Twenty years from now you'll wonder what you ever saw in Johnny Green.
Twenty years from now I'll be an old woman and it won't matter what I think.
Margie, is your father an undertaker?
